title: SLOW COOKER LENTIL SOUP
directions: Combine all ingredients except spinach in a 4 or 5 quart (4 or 5 L) slow cooker. Cover and cook on low heat setting for 8 â€” 9 hours or until lentils are tender. Remove ham bone and bay leaf; discard bay leaf. Remove and chop meat from ham bone; discard ham bone. Stir meat and spinach into soup. Cover and cook until spinach is wilted, about 2 minutes. Serves 6 to 8.
ingredients: 2 cups (500 mL) dried green lentils, rinsed and drained
